What is the outlook for Tarlov Cysts ?,"In some instances Tarlov cysts can cause nerve pain and other pain, weakness, or nerve root compression. Acute and chronic pain may require changes in lifestyle. If left untreated, nerve root compression can cause permanent neurological damage.",NINDS,Tarlov Cysts
